title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4405.6 - Alarm systems
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4405.6 - Alarm systems

State Regulations

For the purpose of maintaining a uniformly high standard
of branch office security, all branch offices shall be equipped with forced
entry alarm systems that shall be approved by the commission prior to
installation thereof. Additionally, all branch office cashier locations shall
be equipped with alarm systems that shall be approved by the commission prior
to installation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4405.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
